thread.title: New York bday get away
thread.title_full: New York bday get away - Review of World Center Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: juddw2017
title: New York bday get away
text:
View from room was amazing. Staff were very helpful in bringing bags to room and helping with off site parking. Room was small but very adequate. Only complaint i had was room was not made up and amenities replenished from day to day. But after complaining to the desk we needed fresh towels,shampoo,and coffee it was restocked accordingly.... but still bed wasnt made....i would def stay here again
Room Tip: Def recommend paying alittle more for a room facing the memorial....amazing breath taking views See more room tips
